actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management

official_title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure of crop insurance premium subsidies in the public interest.
short_title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2012

summary.text: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2012 - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure of specified crop insurance premium subsidy information in the public interest.

titles.title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2012
To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure of crop insurance premium subsidies in the public interest.
